title: Early Reading Bundle: 16 Stories with Morals For Creative Kids
description: Check out these short stories with lovable characters who are eager to learn and grow. They're perfect for Readers just starting off or anyone looking to bring back memories of their childhood. You will love reading these to your youngsters and watching them learn to read in the process.Parents will love the lessons their children learn from these stories!Kids will love the friendly characters!Grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren!Check it out and see for yourself.** Click "Buy Now with 1 click" to reserve your copy forever**
author: Betty J. Byers
